books.name: Moby Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: The book is the sailor Ishmael's narrative of the obsessive quest of Ahab, captain of the whaling ship Pequod, for revenge on Moby Dick, the giant white sperm whale that on the ship's previous voyage bit off Ahab's leg at the knee

books.name: Good Omens
books.author: Terry Pratchet
books.description:
In the beginning

It was a nice day.

books.name: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
books.author: Hunter S. Thompson
books.description: We were somewhere around Barstow on the edge of the desert when the drugs began to take hold.
